name: Ring Jump - fun balloon games
description:
Jump into as many rings as possible! Achieve crazy perfects to multiply your score and trigger the awesome ambient retro music.

Get all achievements to unlock awesomes balls and platforms!! Basketball, skull, troll face...will you get them all?

Complete all levels and be the one and only jump master!

Easy gameplay: the ball bounces by itslef, simply tap to make it move forward! Simple tap? Long touch? Just don't fail your landing ;)
